text: Feliciano Muñoz Rivilla (21 August 1936 – 6 November 2017) was a Spanish footballer who played as a defender. He was born in Ávila, Spain. Rivilla made 26 appearances for the Spain national football team, and was in the team for the 1962 FIFA World Cup, the 1964 European Football Championship (where Spain won the title), and the 1966 FIFA World Cup. Rivilla died on 6 November 2017 in Madrid, Spain at the age of 81.Muere Feliciano Rivilla ==References== ==Other websites== * National team data at BDFutbol * * Mundo Deportivo profile / Mundo Deportivo profile Category:1936 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Spanish footballers
title: Feliciano Rivilla
